nio/FacebookBlock.description: Polls Facebook for public posts via Graph API v1.0.

include_query.title: Include Query Field
include_query.description: Whether to include queries in request to facebook.

limit.title: Limit (per poll)
limit.description: Number of posts to come back on each url request to Facebook.

lookback.title: Lookback
lookback.description: On block start, look back this amount of time to grab old posts.

polling_interval.title: Polling Interval
polling_interval.description: How often Facebook is polled. When using more than one query. Each query will be polled at a period equal to the *polling interval* times the number of queries.

queries.title: Query Strings
queries.description: Queries to include on request to facebook

retry_interval.title: Retry Interval
retry_interval.description: When a url request fails, how long to wait before attempting to try again.

retry_limit.title: Retry Limit
retry_limit.description: Number of times to retry on a poll.

default.description: Creates a new signal for each Facebook Post. Every field on the Post will become a signal attribute. Details about the Facebook Posts can be found [here](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v2.2/post). The following is a list of commonly include attributes, but note that not all will be included on every signal: type, id, message, description, link, from['name'], created_time

nio/FacebookFeed.description: Polls the Facebook graph api ['feed' endpoint](https://developers.facebook.com/docs/graph-api/reference/v2.2/page/feed). To test your *queries* for validity, enter them into the url: `https://www.facebook.com/query/feed`

feed_type.title: Feed Type
feed_type.description: Select which enpoint you want. Defaults to the whole 'feed', but can be limited to just 'posts', 'tagged' or 'promotable_posts'.
